subject: PGA Championship
Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
United States Open (Golf)
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Heading into the P.G.A. Championship this week in Kentucky, there's still much uncertainty over who will be included in the United States Ryder Cup team captained by Tom Watson.
snippet: Heading into the P.G.A. Championship this week in Kentucky, there's still much uncertainty over who will be included in the United States Ryder Cup team captained by Tom Watson.
